name: RelatedActivity
description: The RelatedActivity class lists either incident tracking numbers of incidents or URLs (not both) that refer to activity related to the one described in the IODEFV2 document.  These references may be to local incident tracking numbers or to those of other CSIRTs.

IncidentID.name: IncidentID
IncidentID.description: The incident tracking number of a related incident.

URL.name: URL
URL.description: A URL to activity related to this incident.

restriction.name: restriction
restriction.description: This attribute has been defined in Section 3.2.
